Headline: #94 California Temporary Northbound Reroute near  California/37th
ShortDescription: Northbound #94 California buses are temp rerouted via California, Pershing, Archer, Western, 35th and California due to, street blockage near California/37th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via California, Pershing, Archer, Western, 35th and California due to, street blockage near California/37th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #54 Cicero Temporary Reroute near Cicero/North Ave.
ShortDescription: 54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Cicero/North Ave.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Cicero/North Ave.

  • Southbound buses will operate via Cicero, Grand, Kostner, Division, then resume their normal route on Cicero.
  • Northbound buses will operate via Cicero, North, Kostner, Grand,, then resume their normal route on Cicero.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #72 North Temporary Reroute at Cicero/North Ave.
ShortDescription: 72 North buses are rerouted via North Ave., Laramie, Division, Kostner, then resume their normal route on North Ave, due to street blockage nr Cicero/North Ave.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#72 North buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via North Ave., Laramie, Division, Kostner, then resume their normal route on North Ave., due to street blockage near Cicero/North Ave.
